about_the_game:
16 songs and 52 minutes of pure steampunk music.

Composers:
André Furtado
Leandro Skald

1 - The Saga of Wells
2 -The Town
3 - Threats of Percepolis
4 - Top of Buildings
5 - Persepolis Night
6 - Gale Tale
7 - Breakneck
8 - Rail Track
9 - Cold Station
10 - Steam Threat
11 - Steam Platform
12 - Batlle Up
13 - Impetus
14 - Prelude
15 - Organize
16 - Glory Fall

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Abunto
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4 graphics card with 1GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4 graphics card with 1GB Video RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Wells - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 graphics card with 1GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: 16 songs and 52 minutes of pure steampunk music. Composers: André Furtado Leandro Skald
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
